credit_line: Gift of Henry N. Flynt, Class of 1916, and Frederick V. Geier, Class of 1916
title: Portrait of John Edward Sawyer (b.1917), Class of 1939, Eleventh President of Williams College 1961-1973, College Trustee 1952-1961
inscriptions: l.c. on scratch plate: John Edward Sawyer, Eleventh President, 1961 - 1973 /  Painted by William F. Draper - 1967 / Gift of Henry N. Flynt '16 and Frederick V. Geier '16; l.r. in oil: Wm F Draper '67
